sentences: Seda seksi ajakiri on väga populaarne.
Lugesin tõesti head seksi artiklit selles numbris.
Seksi sisaldavad ajakirjad on tihti vastandlikud.
context: The Estonian word 'seksi' refers to 'sex' or 'sexual content'. It's commonly used in the context of magazines and publications that contain sexual material, as seen in the dictionary definition which mentions it as part of compound words like 'seksi ajakiri' (sex magazine). The word can be used independently to refer to sex itself or as a prefix in compound nouns related to sexuality.
